activities: AMC Networks and its United States-based subsidiaries collect personal and non-personal information from consumers who use websites or mobile applications we offer. The information collected and how that information is used and shared is disclosed in the AMC Networks privacy policy on the collecting website or mobile application.

personaldata: Customer information collected through websites or mobile applications.  The data covered does not include manually processed data.
